faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers before you get started
faq.instructionMobile: Tap a question to see the answer
faq.q1: Do I need WhatsApp Business API or can I use regular WhatsApp?
faq.a1: You need WhatsApp Business API (via Twilio). It's the only way to send automated messages, use approved templates, and track delivery metrics. Regular WhatsApp doesn't support automation or campaigns.
faq.q2: What costs do I pay vs. what's included in my plan?
faq.a2: Your plan includes: hosting, maintenance, support, and minor updates. You pay Twilio directly for messaging costs (approx. $0.03â€“0.05 USD per message in the USA). This gives you full control over your WhatsApp spend.
faq.q3: How fast is setup? What do I need to provide?
faq.a3: Setup takes 7 business days. We just need: your logo, brand colors, product/service list with prices, and access to your WhatsApp number. We handle everything else.
faq.q4: Can I use my own domain?
faq.a4: Yes. We connect your existing domain (e.g., quotes.yourbusiness.com) at no extra configuration cost. You only pay for the domain if you don't already have one.
faq.q5: Can I start simple and add automation later?
faq.a5: Absolutely. Start with Starter and upgrade to Pro or Elite anytime. Your data stays intact and the migration is instant.
faq.q6: What if I already have a website or CRM?
faq.a6: ViralClicker works alongside your existing tools. We can embed the quote form on your current site, or you can use our landing page as a standalone quote funnel.
faq.q7: Where is my data stored? Can I export it?
faq.a7: Your data is stored securely in the cloud with enterprise-grade encryption. You can export all your leads, clients, and quotes as CSV anytimeâ€”your data is always yours.
faq.q8: What's included in setup vs. what counts as 'minor changes'?
faq.a8: Setup includes: landing page design, quote builder configuration, CRM setup, WhatsApp API integration, and 1-on-1 onboarding. Minor changes are small tweaks like editing text, updating form fields, or modifying WhatsApp templatesâ€”not new features or redesigns.
faq.a9: Yes, no penalty. Your plan renews monthly and you can cancel anytime. We provide a full backup of your data (leads, clients, quotes).
faq.a10: We respond via WhatsApp and email during business hours (Mondayâ€“Friday, 9 AMâ€“6 PM EST). Response time: under 4 hours on business days. Elite plans get priority support with under 2-hour response.
